name: backboard
description: A Promise-based wrapper around IndexedDB with sane error and transaction handling

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build-esm && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-esm: rm -rf dist/esm && BABEL_ENV=esm babel index.js --out-dir dist/esm && BABEL_ENV=esm babel lib --out-dir dist/esm/lib && sed 's/module.exports = backboard/export default backboard/' dist/esm/index.js > dist/esm/index2.js && mv dist/esm/index2.js dist/esm/index.js
scripts.build-umd: rm -rf dist/umd && BABEL_ENV=umd babel index.js --out-dir dist/umd && BABEL_ENV=umd babel lib --out-dir dist/umd/lib
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
